body:
On Media
By DYLAN BYERS and  HADAS GOLD
7/15/15 6:55 PM EDT
President Obama is fed up with reporters' questions.
Hillary Clinton re-re-introduces herself to the nation.
Donald Trump's anger connects with conservatives.
Ted Cruz challenges the Fox News' debate criteria.
CNN's Chris Cuomo takes on his conservative critics.
Nicolle Wallace will leave 'The View' at season's end.
Sasha Frere-Jones heads to The Los Angeles Times.
And political journalism loses another reporter to PR.
© 2015 POLITICO LLC

title: Remainders
